titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several small holes, however the text remains legible.

mods.abstract: Letter reports in detail the surrender of Bussora [Basra] to Persian forces led by Sadoo Khan [Sadiq Khan, Karim Khan's brother] and the return of the the Bussora Council to the town and subsequent interactions with the Persians. An additional note on 15 May 1776 reports that a letter has been sent to Carim Cahn [Karim Khan].
